result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: tá babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: tá babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach babaí
result.orig: tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach babaí
result.html: tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach babaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ponchtml: tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ babaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.ga: bhí aige le babaí a phósadh
result.orig: bhí aige le babaí a phósadh
result.html: bhí aige le babaí a phósadhHe had to marry Babaí.
result.ponchtml: ḃí aige le babaí a ṗósaḋHe had to marry Babaí.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: dar le babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.

result.eng: Babaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ga: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
result.orig: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
result.html: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimheBabaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ponchtml: ḃí lúċáir ṁór ar ḃabaí roiṁeBabaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
